title: Companies push to fill empty offices, as some city centers sit empty
description: Google is stepping up enforcement of its three-day-a-week in-office policy for hybrid workers, joining companies like Meta, according to memos obtained by CNBC. NBC News’ Jacob Ward has details on how the work-from-home era many enjoyed continues to evolve.

title: Gun used in Florida neighbor's killing was bought last year after previous dispute, affidavit says
description: OCALA, Fla. — A white woman charged with fatally shooting her Black neighbor through a closed door said she purchased the handgun used in the killing about a year ago following an altercation between them, an arrest affidavit states.

title: Nutrient found in high-protein foods helps slow aging in animals — and maybe humans, too
description: Taurine, an ingredient present in protein-rich foods and often added to energy drinks, may slow down the aging process, new science suggests.

title: FBI agent who testified for Republicans was suspended over leaked sensitive information
description: Garrett O’Boyle, whom House Republicans presented as an FBI whistleblower, was suspended for alleging leaking sensitive information to Project Veritas.

title: N.Y. sends firefighters to Canadian wildfires as U.S. records worst smoke day in 20 years
description: New York sending firefighters to help fight Canada blazes

title: YouTube demonetizes Candace Owens anti-trans videos, says misgendering part of hateful conduct policy
description: YouTube said that it demonetized several videos on Candace Owens' channel under its hateful content policies, which it said may include misgendering.

title: Minors may need parents’ permission to join social media under newly-passed Louisiana bill
description: Kids and teens under 18 in Louisiana may soon need their parents’ permission to sign up for online accounts, including for social media, gaming and more, under a newly-passed bill in the state.

title: Funeral company owner allegedly shoots 2 at a child's burial service, killing a pallbearer, police say
description: The owner of a funeral company is facing murder charges after allegedly shooting two people at a child's burial service, killing a man serving as a pallbearer, police said.

title: Supreme Court strikes down Alabama congressional map in voting rights dispute
description: The Supreme Court on Thursday struck down Republican-drawn congressional districts in Alabama that civil rights activists say discriminated against Black voters.

title: Ukraine launches counteroffensive against Russia
description: Ukraine's military has launched its long-awaited counteroffensive against Russian forces, two military sources told NBC News.

title: Wildfire smoke snarls U.S. air travel with flight delays
description: The wildfire smoke that has cast a sickly pall over major cities across the eastern United States appeared to be snarling air travel Thursday.

title: Florida grand jury investigates Trump classified document handling
description: Florida grand jury investigates Trump classified document handling

title: Pat Robertson, conservative evangelist and Christian Coalition founder, dies at 93
description: Pat Robertson, the conservative evangelist and media mogul who galvanized the modern Christian right, cultivated a massive national following and regularly drew criticism for his incendiary political statements, died on Thursday, his official website said.

title: Senators to introduce a bipartisan AI bill aimed at keeping up with China
description: A bipartisan group of senators will introduce legislation aimed at managing the rise of artificial intelligence as Congress turns its focus to addressing AI.

title: 8 children stabbed in knife attack in France
description: PARIS — Eight young children and one adult were stabbed in a knife attack at a beauty spot in southern France on Thursday, police said.

title: Air quality concerns continue into Thursday as wildfire smoke covers the Northeast
description: After a day of orange haze that cast a pall over New York City, obscuring some of the nation’s most well-known landmarks with smoke from Canadian wildfires, New Yorkers and others were in store for another day of bad air Thursday.

title: An unsubstantiated claim that Jamie Foxx was hospitalized after a Covid vaccination is going viral on social media
description: A claim that Jamie Foxx was hospitalized after being seriously injured by a Covid vaccine has gone viral. A representative for Foxx said the claim is untrue.

title: Fox News tells Tucker Carlson he violated his contract with new Twitter show
description: Fox News told Tucker Carlson's lawyers that the former star anchor breached his contract with the conservative network when he launched a new show on Twitter.
